notes: Changed: Under the hood improvements with React/Redux. Your settings and Domain list will be migrated automatically on update.
Changed: Changed Strict String Matching to Expression Matching. Now you can use wildcards in your domains like git*b.com to match github.com and gitlab.com
Added: Support for deleting history via the path such as reddit.com/r/*/comments/*
Changed: UI Refresh with BootStrap
Changed: The old exported Domains are not compatible anymore with 2.X.X since it is an entirely different (better) storage format.
Some code cleanup
Added Default Settings button in Settings
New custom icon and color theme!
New Feature: The Blue Icon shows you how many times that domain's entries show up in history
New Feature: 'Clear All History for this Domain'
Added tooltips
Added release notes to the welcome screen
New colors for Icon Badge
Popup visual tweaks
Used Unicode times icon (Ã—) for remove buttons
Reasonable widths for inputs
Fixed a bug where using the same file to import URLS after 'Removing All' would not import again
Workaround for Firefox not downloading exported text files
Responsive Settings Menu
Revamped visuals for Settings
Now this extension can count how many times the history got deleted
Added Export and Import URLS
Added Display when the icon is disabled(under pages that are not HTTP and HTTPS)
Fixed table not updating after clicking the remove icon
Fixed the Keep Days value from being set to a negative value
Fixed Compatibility with Chrome
Settings Menu UI Revamped
New Blue Icons
New Feature: Keep History for X Days
Add URLS by Input
First Release!
